onCreateTask(bytes32,address,address,byt.details: calls OResolverModule to check if task creator is whitelisted. whitelist state lives in OResolverModule and not on Ops.

onlyWhitelisted(address).details: Requires taskCreator to be whitelisted to create an OResolver task only if whitelistEnabled is set to true.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.execAddress: Address of contract that should be called.
params.execData: Execution data to be called with / function selector if execution data is yet to be determined.
params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.
params.taskId: Unique hash of the task created.

params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.
params.taskId: Unique hash of the task created.

preCreateTask(address,address).details: Modules can override execAddress or taskCreator. {See ProxyModule-preCreateTask}

params.execAddress: Address of contract that should be called.
params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.

params.execAddress: Address of contract that should be called.
params.execData: Execution data to be called with / function selector if execution data is yet to be determined.
params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.
params.taskId: Unique hash of the task created.

returns._0: address Overriden or original execution address.
returns._1: bytes Overriden or original execution data.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

encodeModuleArg(string,bytes).notice: Helper function to encode arguments for OResolverModule.

postExecCall(bytes32,address,address,byt.notice: Called during `exec` and after execAddress is called.

preCancelTask(bytes32,address).notice: Called before taskId is removed from _createdTasks[].

preExecCall(bytes32,address,address,byte.notice: Called during `exec` and before execAddress is called.
